dist<-function(centroids){
  for (i in 1:nrow(centroids)){
    print(paste("current i is: ", i))
    diff <- std_data - centroids[rep(i,178),] # make 178-rows matrix where each row is a copy of a row in ranwine. And subtranct that matrix from the original data to get the difference.
    print(diff)
    diff_sqrd <- diff^2
    print(diff_sqrd)# Square the differences
    euc_dist <- as.data.frame(sqrt(rowSums(diff_sqrd)))
    eucdist[i]<-euc_dist
  print(eucdist)
  }
}
